revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A dissertation on the languages, literature, and manners of Eastern nations. Originally prefixed to a dictionary, Persian, Arabic, and English. By John Richardson,..."
revision.text: Possibly: A dissertation on the languages, literature, and manners of Eastern nations. Originally prefixed to a dictionary, Persian, Arabic, and English. By John Richardson, Esq. F. S. A. of the Middle Temple, and of Wadham College, Oxford. (Oxford : Printed at the Clarendon Press. Sold by J. Murray, No. 32, Fleetstreet, London; and by D. Prince, Oxford, M DCC LXX VIII. [1778]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2489171~S1
